bug.author: cyrilthank
bug.description:
/kind bug
after completing the installation and setup steps in <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/k8s/kfctl-k8s-istio/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/started/k8s/kfctl-k8s-istio/</denchmark-link>
i dont see the namespaces in the centralboard UI
to be not only see the namespaces but select namespace to proceed with the steps in <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/notebooks/setup/>https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/notebooks/setup/</denchmark-link>
Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] Please help as this is a show stopper for us as the workaround in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/3870>#3870</denchmark-link>
is not working and erroring with couldn't generate KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Generate failed for kustomize: kustomize generate failed Error: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: couldn't copy application knative-crds And already we are unable to get kubeflow working with kubernetes due to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/4145>#4145</denchmark-link>
Hence request your help Environment: Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): kfctl version: (use kfctl version): kfctl v0.6.2-0-g47a0e4c7 Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) microk8s Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.3", GitCommit:"2d3c76f9091b6bec110a5e63777c332469e0cba2", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-08-19T11:13:54Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.9", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.3", GitCommit:"2d3c76f9091b6bec110a5e63777c332469e0cba2", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-08-19T11:05:50Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.9", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): NAME="Ubuntu" VERSION="18.04.3 LTS (Bionic Beaver)" ID=ubuntu ID_LIKE=debian PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS" VERSION_ID="18.04" HOME_URL="<denchmark-link:https://www.ubuntu.com/>https://www.ubuntu.com/</denchmark-link> " SUPPORT_URL="<denchmark-link:https://help.ubuntu.com/>https://help.ubuntu.com/</denchmark-link> " BUG_REPORT_URL="<denchmark-link:https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/>https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/</denchmark-link> " PRIVACY_POLICY_URL="<denchmark-link:https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy>https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/privacy-policy</denchmark-link> " VERSION_CODENAME=bionic UBUNTU_CODENAME=bionic

comments.comment: Issue Label Bot is not confident enough to auto-label this issue. See <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> for more details.
We just released Kubeflow 0.7.0 which fixes a number of issues with central dashboard. Please try the latest release and if you are still having problems please open a new issue.
